00036 #ifndef PACC_Threading_Task_hpp_
00037 #define PACC_Threading_Task_hpp_
00038 
00039 #include "PACC/Threading/Condition.hpp"
00040 
00041 namespace PACC {
00042     
00043     namespace Threading {
00044         
00051         class Task : public Condition {
00052             public: 
00054             Task(void) : mRunning(false), mCompleted(false) {}
00056             virtual ~Task(void) {lock(); while(!mCompleted) wait(); unlock();}
00057             
00062             bool isCompleted(void) const {return mCompleted;}
00063             
00068             bool isRunning(void) const {return mRunning;}
00069             
00074             virtual void main(void) = 0;
00075             
00077             void reset(void) {lock(); mRunning = mCompleted = false; unlock();}
00078             
00083             void wait(bool inLock=true) const {
00084                 if(inLock) lock();
00085                 while(!mCompleted) Condition::wait();
00086                 if(inLock) unlock();
00087             }
00088             
00089             protected:
00090             bool mRunning; 
00091             bool mCompleted; 
00092             
00093             friend class SlaveThread;
00094         };
00095         
00096     } // end of Threading namespace 
00097     
00098 } // end of PACC namespace
00099 
00100 #endif // PACC_Threading_Task_hpp_
